title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1934.5 - Monetary limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1934.5 - Monetary limits

State Regulations

The provisions of section
1934.2
of this Part shall not apply
to individual occasions of compensation for goods or services rendered which do
not exceed $2,500 unless the accumulation of said compensation should exceed
$2,500 within a year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1934.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
